hubs.name: Basankusu - Agriculture Concessions
hubs.tagline: Agriculture monitoring at the district level
hubs.description: This hub provides a map of agriculture concessions, overlapping land uses such as logging permits, and transport networks in Basankusu District. Map stories regarding concessions in the district can be published as well as related documents and links. Map data posted in this hub is managed in groups run by the organizations who own it. Only members of a hub can edit the map, add a story, or post a resource link.
